post.body: @burghseyeview Alex loves the stuffed pierogies and he's getting the rest to his set in his stocking!
Should I be?
"capturing pieces of life as they pass by" - I love that! Thanks for the links.
http://tinyurl.com/3k8q33
I like online too but I prefer the classroom. Less distraction & more focus & interaction! E-pro is online too.
I drove Pgh to Philly once for a CRS class. Took another in Pgh and ABR in Pgh. When they offered, I went! Can take ASR online.
I keep thinking I'll pursue an ASR too. You'd think in a city like Pittsburgh, they'd have these classes here! Extremely rare.
I have my ABR - earned a couple years ago. I got a lot from the classes and also from their newsletters & mag. Take some CRS 2.
TY for the WNY property updates. I have an aunt/uncle in W Seneca.
Contact Getaway Cafe: 3049 Sussex Ave 15226; 412-343-1333. Advance notice req on holiday meal orders; pick up by Christmas Eve @ 1 PM.
Getaway Cafe can cook ur Christmas dinner 4U: 2 meal pkgs @ $99 and 1 @ $69 srvs 8-10/ single meal @ $11.99. Ham turkey or pork avail sep.
It's also a great time to buy! http://kdka.com/local/mortgage.rates.refinance.2.891750.html
The Steeler Nation of Rome: http://tinyurl.com/4bjzgr
And the sun comes out to dry up all the rain!
Just received my VALENTINE address labels in the mail from the American Heart Association!!!
Paragon Homes is offering to pay your 1st 6 mos P&I payments if purch/sign to purchase by 12/31! Ask me for more details.
That EnP blog link to commercial was a RT from @davidpryke! (too many characters for one post!)
The story of the Eat n Park Christmas tree commercial http://tinyurl.com/6gdtbk
Anyone want to snag a good deal on a N Strabane townhome already occupied with a renter? Super fast closing.
I just saved 10% off my Target.com order thru www.fuelperksmall.com from Giant Eagle!
